Registry

We are so delighted you are coming to our wedding. A gift is not necessary. Thank you for being in our lives, and celebrating our commitment to each other. If you feel you really must, well, OK. We are registered at a few venues via myregistry.com. Or, if you'd like to help sponsor some of our honeymoon activities (our dream is to travel to Scotland Japan), please consider taking a look at the website for our honey moon fund. There you can pitch in for things like a stay at a bed and breakfast, a scotch tasting, or a couple of giant bowls of ramen.

Questions? Please feel free to contact us at chargotpina@gmail.com.
